wss-desc: Dynamic namespace management system for MediaWiki.
wss-invalid-page-description: The page you have requested is not valid. Please click on a page in the navigation menu above to return.
wss-internal-exception-intro: An unhandled exception was thrown and the application could not continue.
wss-missing-permissions-description: You do not have permission to edit this space. If you believe this is a mistake, please contact an administrator of this wiki.
wss-debug-information-intro: The debug information below may be of interest to the administrator / help desk:
wss-how-to-get-help-intro: This error is likely due to some unexpected behaviour or to a misconfiguration of WSSpaces. Contact an administrator of this wiki, and send them the error message above.
wss-add-space-intro: You will be the Space Administrator for this new space. Once the space is created, only you can edit its details. You can add new space administrators once a space has been created.
wss-add-space-form-namespace-help: Namespace key must be unique. It will be used as a prefix for the pages in this space.
wss-invalid-input: Something went wrong while processing your input
wss-generic-inline-error: Something went wrong while trying to process your request, please try again
wss-cannot-remove-self: You cannot revoke your own administrator privileges. Please ask another administrator to revoke your privileges.
wss-update-log-changed-admins: This update also changed space administrators from $1 to $2
wss-api-missing-param-nsid: The required parameter nsid is missing
wss-api-missing-param-nskey: The required parameter nskey is missing
wss-api-missing-param-nsname: The required parameter nsname is missing
wss-api-missing-param-nsdescription: The required parameter nsdescription is missing
wss-api-missing-param-nsadmins: The required parameter nsadmins is missing, please provide at least one admin
wss-api-missing-param-namespace: The required parameter namespace is missing
wss-api-invalid-param-detailed-nsid: The parameter nsid is invalid: S1
wss-namespace-in-use: This namespace is already in use. Please choose a different name.
wss-invalid-namespace: A namespace may only consist of letters.
wss-invalid-namespace-name: A namespace name may only consist of letters, numbers and spaces.
wss-namespace-name-in-use: This namespace name is already in use. Please choose a different name.
log-description-space: This page lists all transactions to spaces, and spaces that were created.
apihelp-addspace-summary: API module to add new spaces to WSSpaces
apihelp-editspace-summary: API module to edit existing spaces in WSSpaces
apihelp-archivespace-summary: API module to archive spaces in WSSpaces
apihelp-unarchivespace-summary: API module to unarchive spaces in WSSpaces
apihelp-query+spaces-summary: API module to query spaces defined in WSSpaces
apihelp-query+namespaceadmins-summary: API module to query admins belonging to a namespace defined in WSSpaces
wss-api-nskey-param: The namespace key of the space. Must be unique and must only consist of letters.
wss-api-nsname-param: The name of the space. Must be unique and may consist of letters, number and spaces.
wss-api-nsdescription-param: A short description of the space.
wss-api-nsadmins-param: The list of namespace administrators of the space. Should be a comma-separated list of user names.
wss-api-nsid-param: The ID of the space. Must be an existing space ID.
wss-api-archived-param: Whether to list only archived spaces or only active spaces.
wss-api-namespace-param: The namespace you want to get the list of admins for.
apihelp-query-example-not-archived: Query all spaces that are not archived.
apihelp-query-example-archived: Query all spaces that are archived.
apihelp-query-example-namespace-admins: Query all admins belonging to a namespace.
wss-permission-denied: You do not have permission to view the $1 list.
wss-permission-denied-spaceadmins: You do not have permission to view the spaceadmins list.
